params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: The name of the failover replica. If specified at instance creation, a failover replica is created for the instance. The name doesn't include the project ID.

params.name: data.available
params.description: The availability status of the failover replica. A false status indicates that the failover replica is out of sync. The primary instance can only failover to the failover replica when the status is true.
